title: Totally awesome
text: It was such an amazing experience and to be able to drive on the other side of the road was totally cool! Staff was super friendly and did an excellent job at guiding us when we went of track...they even ordered us a taxi for to be able to get back to St. Julian.

title: Horrible
text:
We pre paid this hotel with our vacation package, not realizing it was the
Economy room which basically looked like a prison cell. Very outdated and poorly decorated. A computer screen on the wall for a TV. It was extremely depressing...We immediately got on Hotels.com and booked a better hotel and did not care that we lost some money! The staff were mediocre and did not know how to deal with guests that were unhappy and checking out. We returned the metal key to the young lady at the front desk but she did not want to or did not know how to check us out or give us any proof that we had checked out, even though the room was paid in full for 4 days.

title: Breathtaking
text: It is jus amazing to be able to see these structures still standing. You can tell some have and are still being renovated...but definitely out if this world. It was 10 euros pp.

title: Amazing
text: What a quaint perfectly located boutique hotel walking distance from the Acropolis. It was very clean and updated. The breakfast was excellent and they can arrange for a hotel car to take you to the airport.

title: Zeus
text: Amazing energy here! Only 6 euros to enter. Very well kept and very near the Acropolis. You are able to walk the grounds and take as much time as you want.

title: The View
text: I have to say the food and view of the Acropolis were excellent! It’s a cozy rooftop restaurant with excellent service, followed by excellent libations and company. The only minus was as we were leaving and we were the only ones left the main waiter/Maitre’d and his staff laughed at us!

title: Happy Hour
text: Happy hour food was excellent the green chili pork with cheese in a kettle is insanely delicious! You also need to try the Mac n Cheese in green chili!

title: Yummy Hummus
text: Excellent food and their Israeli white wine is excellent! Great for eating there inside or outside and take out food!

title: FANTASTIC
text: Laguna Lodge is a fantastic, amazing, friendly, elegant, cozy (6 suites), personable, relaxing, professional and clean Lodge with incredible views. You start your wonderful journey by boat which is pretty much the only way to get there. The staff is courteous and the Lodge is just overall courteous to its surroundings being an Eco-friendly Lodge to the last detail (from construction to food)! You are welcomed to the vegetarian kingdom, where with their wonderful menu you don't miss eating meat at all. Laguna Lodge is not a step away from paradise it is PARADISE! I will never forget greeting the New Year 2011 at Laguna Lodge! We just had a wonderful time.
